title: I-107 2x2 Townhome With Water View!
posting_body: Certain floor plans may have different amenities depending on when they were updated, what building they're in, etc.

On-Site Maintenance • On-Site Management • Package Receiving •

Clubhouse with Kitchen, Lounge Area, and Fireplace • Complete 24-Hour Fitness Center • Easy Freeway Access to Downtown Seattle, Sea-Tac Airport, and the Greater Eastside • European-Style Apartment Homes • Expansive Lake Washington Views • Garages and Covered Parking •
Green Friendly Community • Onsite Recycling Program • Outdoor Heated Pool and Spa • Package Locker • Playscape
Conveniently on Location • Richly Detailed Architecture • Two- and Three-Bedroom Tri-Level Townhomes •
We Welcome Pets* • Wi-Fi in Resident Lounge and Poolside

Abundant Storage and Closet Space • Breathtaking Lake Washington Views* • Custom Quality Fixtures • Designer Interior Finishes • Direct Access Garages* • Elevated Windows and 9 Foot Ceiling • Energy Efficient Lighting •
Energy Efficient Windows • Energy Star Appliances • Full Size Washer and Dryer • Gourmet Kitchens with Center Islands • Personal Patio or Balcony • Wired for Technology •
Due to COVID-19 restrictions imposed by local and state health orders, certain amenities may not be available or their availability may be limited in order to comply with the health orders.
In light of COVID19 developments and recommendations from health officials, we have adopted a virtual leasing model until further notice.
Our leasing office is not open to residents or the public.
Please call our office or click the COVID19 Virtual Leasing link in the main menu for more details.
Pets - allowed, One time Fee $250.00, Rent $25.00, Deposit $250.00 Cats - allowed Dogs - allowed We Love Pets!
